violations.message: Entity 'Product' appears immutable. Consider adding @ReadOnly annotation.
Entity 'Product' is abstract. Ensure proper inheritance strategy (@Inheritance) is defined (SINGLE_TABLE, JOINED, TABLE_PER_CLASS) to avoid mapping issues.
Version field 'version' uses Integer. Consider using Long for systems with high concurrency to avoid overflow.
Root entity 'Product' defines inheritance strategy 'SINGLE_TABLE'. Ensure all subclasses use the same strategy.
Abstract entity 'Product' cannot be instantiated. Ensure all concrete subclasses properly implement the hierarchy.
Entity 'Product' uses discriminator column 'PRODUCT_TYPE'. Consider using CHAR discriminator type (default) for single-character values for better performance.

SINGLE_TABLE inheritance used. Discriminator column 'PRODUCT_TYPE' should be indexed for efficient subclass filtering.
